project.name: Flynn AAC
project.description: Bilingual AAC app for Flynn with ARASAAC symbols and LAMP motor planning

M1.name: Core AAC
M1.description: Basic symbol grid, navigation, phrase building, TTS

requirements.description: Design system with warm, sensory-friendly visual foundation
steps: Define color tokens for light/dark modes (warm, muted tones only)
Verify background uses subtle warm paper texture (cream/off-white)
Verify dark mode uses warm charcoal (not pure black)
Define LAMP category colors (muted sage green, dusty yellow, muted rose)
Define typography scale with Bulgarian Cyrillic support
Define spacing system (4px base unit)
Define animation specs (105% max scale, soft opacity transitions)
Create SwiftUI theme file with reusable view modifiers
Verify touch targets are >= 60x60 points
Document accessibility and sensory considerations
Tap any symbol on the grid
Verify audio playback starts within 100ms
Verify visual feedback (scale/highlight) appears on tap
Verify audio plays in currently selected language
Test with device offline - audio should play from cache

requirements.description: Phrase builder accumulates symbols and speaks complete phrase
steps: Tap multiple symbols to add to phrase bar
Verify symbols appear left-to-right in order tapped
Tap speak button to play complete phrase
Tap clear button to remove all symbols
Tap individual symbol in phrase bar to remove it
Navigate categories - verify phrase bar persists

requirements.description: Category navigation with consistent symbol positions (LAMP)
steps: Tap category folder to open category grid
Verify navigation completes within 200ms
Verify back button is always in top-left
Navigate away and return - verify symbol positions unchanged
Close and reopen app - verify positions unchanged

requirements.description: Language toggle switches labels and TTS without moving symbols
steps: Tap language toggle in header
Verify all symbol labels switch to selected language
Tap a symbol and verify TTS plays in correct language
Verify symbol images remain identical
Verify symbol grid positions are 100% identical
Restart app - verify language setting persists

requirements.description: Adjustable grid size with position preservation
steps: Open settings and change grid from 4x4 to 5x5
Verify existing symbols keep their [row, col] positions
Verify new cells added to right and bottom edges
Attempt to contract grid with symbols in outer cells
Verify warning dialog appears
Verify touch targets are >= 60x60 points at all sizes

requirements.description: Full offline functionality for core AAC
steps: Enable airplane mode
Launch app and verify all symbols display
Tap symbols and verify audio plays
Build and speak phrases
Verify no error messages appear
Re-enable network and verify usage logs sync
Tap symbol and verify scale animation (105% then return)
Verify highlight overlay appears on tap
Tap symbol and verify it animates into phrase bar
Tap speak button and verify visual pulse while playing
Tap rapidly and verify animations don't block input
Disable animations in settings and verify static feedback
